description: Two French doctors spark anger by suggesting coronavirus vaccines be trialled in Africa.
title: Coronavirus: France racism row over doctors' Africa testing comments
title_page: Coronavirus: France racism row over doctors' Africa testing comments - BBC News
maintext: ¡°A bit like as it is done elsewhere for some studies on Aids. In prostitutes, we try things because we know that they are highly exposed and that they do not protect themselves.¡±
